data.title: Haryana Lok Sabha Elections 2024: Dates, schedule, phases, constituencies, candidates, other details; All you need to know
data.meta_description: In Haryana, the ruling BJP-led NDA faces challenges ahead of the 2024 Lok Sabha Elections. Economic slowdown, farming issues, and unemployment stir discontent among voters, potentially weakening the incumbent's hold. Opposition parties like Congress and AAP eye this opportunity, vying for support.
data.text:
Synopsis

In Haryana, the ruling BJP-led NDA faces challenges ahead of the 2024 Lok Sabha Elections. Economic slowdown, farming issues, and unemployment stir discontent among voters, potentially weakening the incumbent's hold. Opposition parties like Congress and AAP eye this opportunity, vying for support.

Haryana, strategically positioned between Delhi and Punjab, plays a pivotal role in North India's political landscape. As the 2024 Lok Sabha Elections draw near, the state's political climate is under close scrutiny. Currently held by the BJP-led NDA alliance, which swept all 10 Lok Sabha seats in 2019, Haryana faces potential challenges due to brewing discontent among the populace. Issues such as economic slowdown, agricultural distress, and unemployment simmer beneath the surface, potentially eroding the incumbent's stronghold. Opposition parties like Congress, AAP, and regional players like INLD are viewing this discontent as an opportunity to rally support and mount a significant challenge against the BJP-led NDA's dominance.

Haryana Lok Sabha Elections 2024: Dates

The Election Commission has announced the schedule for polling in Haryana for the Lok Sabha polls 2024. The state will go to polls in a single phase on May 25. The results will be declared on June 4.

Haryana Lok Sabha Elections 2024: Phases

Given the relatively small number of seats, Haryana will once again witness its Lok Sabha Elections conducted in a single phase on May 25th.

Haryana Lok Sabha Elections 2024: Constituencies

Ranking 18th in India's roster of Lok Sabha seat allocations, Haryana boasts a modest tally of ten seats. Among these, eight are unreserved, while two are designated for SC candidates. Notably, the BJP secured a clean sweep in the 2019 elections, clinching victory in all ten constituencies after securing seven seats in 2014.

Haryana Lok Sabha Elections 2024: Key Candidates and Alliances

The forthcoming 2024 Lok Sabha Elections are poised to witness a significant departure from the political dynamics of 2019. With parties like AAP aligning with the INC under the banner of the I.N.D.I.A alliance, the BJP faces the prospect of formidable competition in the looming electoral showdown.

Here is the complete list of candidates for Haryana Lok Sabha elections in 2024:
